findings.issue: GDP impact calculation is oversimplified - doesn't account for productivity multipliers or economic value-add beyond wages
Presenting mean of percentage changes without accounting for population distribution weights

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: mathematical_accuracy
Severity: minor
Line: 61
Quote: "incomeEffect = inputs.incomeElasticity * (inputs.ubiAmount / (inputs.avgWage * inputs.baseWorkHours))"
Issue: Formula assumes linear elasticity response which may not hold for large income changes
[/FINDING]

parsed.issue: Formula assumes linear elasticity response which may not hold for large income changes
